title: ArtyTorrent Pack 67-Rock Drum Loops 120-129bpm-WAV samples
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 67-Rock Drum Loops 120-129bpm-WAV samples
-------------------------------------------------------

"Live" loops recorded on vintage acoustic drumkits. Pretty basic stuff, but some of the samples are quite funky. Add some distortion for Big Beat or Industrial breaks, or slice them up to make your own kits.
Tempo ranges from 120-129 bpm.

Torrent contains 10 RAR files with 215 loops
--------------------------------------------
Cream 120 (6 loops)
Double Platinum 127-129 (21 loops)
Fish Rock Drums 120-125 (34 loops)
Groovemaster Drums 120-129 (72 loops)
Misc Rock Drums 120-129 (19 loops)
NYC 121 (20 loops)
Rock Drums 120 (11 loops)
SF Rock Drums 120-123 (11 loops)
Small Kit 120 (11 loops)
Tite Shadow 120 (10 loops)

Samples are from a variety of sources including EastWest, Sony/Sonic Foundry, Loopology/Syntrillium, and  have all been normalized and acidized as 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz.

--
Arty - "Keep on rocking in the free world"
18th February 2008.


P.S. The plan is to keep posting medium sized packs of drum loops (with the tempo gradually increasing) with the occasional full CD uploaded too. I have several things I could upload. Let me know if you are particularly interested in any of the following:
Spectrasonics Atmosphere, Zero-G Deep House v2, Loopmasters Raw Power, Cakewalk Dimension Pro VSTi, Loopmasters Drum n Bass Producer, Sampletank 2 + all instruments, Zero-G Nu Jointz, Zero-G Sounds of the 70s.... or something else that I&#039;ve probably got but haven&#039;t listed.
